name: loginnotify_seen_net
comment: Summary of subnets used by local or global users

columns.name: lsn_time_bucket
columns.comment: Time since epoch divided by the bucket duration, e.g. 15 days

columns.comment: Truncated hash of IP address subnet

indexes.name: loginnotify_seen_net_user
